entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023
